name: setCredentialsWithRecordType(_:authenticationType:authenticationItems:continueItems:context:)
desc: Sets the credentials for interaction with the node using other types of authentication available to Open Directory.
declaration:
func setCredentialsWithRecordType(_ inRecordType: String!, 
               authenticationType inType: String!, 
              authenticationItems inItems: [Any]!, 
                    continueItems outItems: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSArray?>!, 
                          context outContext: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<AnyObject?>!) throws
